txt_en: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
txt_cn: 爱不过是一个词而已，直到有一个人来到你面前，赋予它意义。
author: Paulo Coelho

txt_en: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
txt_cn: 要抱最大的希望，做最坏的打算，从结果中学习。
author: Zig Ziglar

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Shanbay

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Shanbay

txt_cn: 永恒是由每一个当下组成的。
author: Emily Dickinson

txt_en: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
txt_cn: 艺术能洗去日常生活覆在灵魂上的尘埃。
author: Pablo Picasso

txt_en: One of the most important things you can do on this earth is to let people know they are not alone.
txt_cn: 在这个世界上，你所能做的最重要的事情之一，就是让别人知道他们并不孤单。
author: Shannon L. Alder
